entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Outerloop crossgen 2 failures: The file is not a ReadyToRun image #87299
  • Mixed integer size IL operations result in `AccessViolationException`s on 32-bit x86 machines #87298
  • Re-evaluate if we need `RefTypeKill` Refpositions #87294
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Stream: Equals #87293
  • QuicConnection not being released after exception #87291
  • System.IO.FileSystem.Watcher.Tests crash on osx x64 Debug #87287
  • if (SecurityIdentifier == null) throws PlatformNotSupportedException on linux #87282
  • [browser] multiple dotnet runtimes on the same page #87280
    8.0.0
  • [mono] System.IO.Pipes.Tests test fails on `linux_bionic-x64 Release AllSubsets_Mono` #87279
  • string.Format throws FormatException on Mac Catalyst/ARM64 #87277
  • MsQuicPlatformDetectionTests failures in CI #87275
  • Random crashes in System.Net.Mail test suites with mono interpreter #87271
  • [API Proposal]: Make System.Security.Cryptography.Oids constants public #87270
  • System.Net.Requests.Tests, System.Net.Security.Tests failing with `Segmentation fault` on Debian 10 #87268
  • [mono] Tests failing with `Failed to find compatible device: arm64-v8a` #87267
  • [API Proposal]: Add transport error code to QuicException #87262
  • [API Proposal]: udate QuicError values #87259
    8.0.0
  • When firing rundown events we do not distinguish between generic overloads for jitted methods #87257
    8.0.0
  • The ETW event generated by EventSource.SendManifest is lost at receiver due to size limit when extended data is appended #87255
  • Add additional LoggerMethodAttribute constructors #87254
    8.0.0
  • Source generation support for new ILogger work #87253
    8.0.0
  • Integrate ConsoleLogExporter functionality from dotnet/extensions #87250
    8.0.0
  • Issue with static abstract in interfaces #87248
  • Handle dotnet/extensions scenarios for HttpClient logging #87247
    8.0.0
  • Handle dotnet/extensions scenarios in HttpClient metrics middleware #87245
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildInvalidSignatureTwice #87244
  • Reduce duplication between InstrumentRecorder and MeterCollector #87243
    8.0.0
  • ICorDebugGCReferenceEnum.Next fails to return stack references in .NET 8 preview 4 #87239

Closed

  • Regressions due to QJFL and OSR #67594
    8.0.0
  • Apple Silicon eventsourceerror failure in jitstress2 CI #48786
    8.0.0
  • StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase.Equals is not unrolled for literals #86999
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add IHostApplicationBuilder interface #85486
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests timeouts on CI #85168
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: Deserialise object #86646
  • [jitstress] JIT/opt/Devirtualization/Comparer_get_Default failing with AV #87258
    8.0.0
  • HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT #80911
    8.0.0
  • Middleware and Redaction for ILogger #87252
    8.0.0
  • GC Dynamic adaptation to app sizes: Support configuration using MSBuild property #87028

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize nullcheck for Interlocked.* operations #87297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2196826 #87296
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Revise how we set tiering and pgo options for spmi benchmark collections #87292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some dead code that threw file load exception #87290
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0][PERF]Forced Urllib to specific version and removed force-reinstall per (#87286) #87289
    area-Infrastructure
  • Delete Debian 10 test runs #87288
    area-System.Net
  • [Release/7.0][PERF] Backport urllib fix to release/7.0 #87286
    area-Infrastructure
  • [hot reload][mono] Implement support for adding static and instance fields to generic classes #87285
    area-EnC-mono
  • [wasm] Introduce <InvariantTimezone> build flag #87284
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Removing the struct/unmanaged constraint from the Vector types #87283
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Don't update downlevel runtime packs when producing prerelease version #87281
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] make console always redirected #87278
    area-System.Console, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • [browser] make cwraps more conditional #87274
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Refactor icall opcodes #87269
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: Reorder physical promotion and forward sub #87265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP don't set mark array bits during concurrent marking #87261
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wip][nativeaot][tests] Add smoke runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS #87260
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable `System.Text.Json` tests AOT #87256
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Generate debug info even if managed debug info not present #87251
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Import isinst Nullable as underlying type #87241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure that Vector<T> is tracked as "optimistic" for crossgen2 #87240
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Handle primitive remainder stores to regularly promoted fields in physical promotion #87217
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move DynamicCodeSupport default into aot targets #87135
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add IHostApplicationBuilder interface #86974
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix DeserializeAsyncEnumerable generic recursion issue. #87276
    area-System.Text.Json, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Don't enable ILLink analyzers for unsupported TFMs #87071
    area-Meta
  • [browser] mono_wasm_invoke_method_bound with exception root and GC region #87266
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix for getelema1 crash in specific scenarios #87246
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Remove calls to GetHighPrecisionTimeStamp from allocate_uoh_object #87273
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix a couple of inequalities in promotion decomposition #87186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Vector<T> fallbacks for Vector128<T> #85916
    area-System.Memory
  • Don't use GetEarlyNode in impGetSpecialIntrinsicExactReturnType #87263
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] remove mono_wasm_load_data_archive #87264
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][arm64] Handle sysctlbyname failing to find system options. #87189
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js - follow up #87051
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugging] Enable debugging when Device Toolbar is enabled and Iphone is selected #86920
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Don't link Swift/CryptoKit on iOS-like platforms #87216
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix inline decision reporting + noinline propagation #87115
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ifdef out DynamicDependencies that are not necessary #87209
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Setup for benchmark runs with physical promotion. #87227
    tenet-performance-benchmarks
  • Handle diagnostic port configuration in NativeAOT #87088
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize MethodTable on both sides of `==` #87238
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete some dead code #87249
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix running debugger tests on windows #87228
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix crossgen2.pdb #86512
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix FreeBSD build break #87242
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update ClaimsIdentity debug display #87159
    area-System.Security
  • Simplify Random for ulong #87219
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement `FlipBit` #83400
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #86358
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • SHAKE128 and SHAKE256 #87099
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 8.0.0
  • Don't publish wixpacks #87222
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #86617
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update to the 22.04 debpkg image so we're on a newer ubuntu version. #86803
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add newly introduced modifiers to our csharp_preferred_modifier_order editorconfig #86668
    area-Meta
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Upgrading SpanHelpers with Vector512 #86655
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add marshalling tests and warn if interface is not partial #87146
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add analyzers and code-fixes to help adoption of source-generated COM #87223
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Update to use the cbl-mariner webassembly images. #86806
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • GDV: don't emit fallback call if classes are "exact" #87055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][jit] Add JIT support for the methods in Vector128<T> on amd64. #86546
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Assign correct slots during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals when widening #87141
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Warn on CustomMarshallerAnalyzer if the MarshaMode is not valid #87198
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] GC, threadpool and some JS interop improvements #86759
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • Fix a couple of issues related to Process.WaitForExit on Unix #87174
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Added IReadOnlyDictionary to HttpRequestOptions #86983
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Combine two table lookups into one while formatting Guid on Arm64 #87126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][ios] Unblock System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.Tests Fails on iOS/tvOS/Wasm #87169
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [mono][tests] Enable DriveInfoUnix test on tvOS #87162
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Add mono hot reload support for updating parameter name #85796
    area-EnC-mono
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample as functional test on the simulator and maccatalyst on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • throw SocketException for Quic transport errors #87208
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Reimplement NegotiateStream using (mostly) public NegotiateAuthenticaton API #86948
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono][aot] Generate 'native-indirect' wrappers in full-aot mode. #86934
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • [iOS][maccatalyst] Reenable MacCatalyst and Simulator CI runs #84930
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-ios
  • JIT: Regularize readbacks for parameters/OSR-locals in physical promotion #87165
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • JIT: Always look for SIMD fields during promotion #84122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [libs] Fix poll events conversion #86843
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Repurpose Gen0ReductionCount field for dynamic heap count diagnostics. #87009
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [iOS] Move to libraries and runtime tests to the OSX 13 queue #87231
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add managed entry points for raising Contention events #87087
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Faster find unwind info on Unix #87204
    tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Fixes and improvements: #87218
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Warn on visibility of interface and StringMarshallingCustomType #87065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Fix WebAssembly hot reload deltas cache #33123
  • When globally installing a tool, a reference to Microsoft.SourceLink.AzureRepos.Git is added causing NU1211 & NU1212 #33116
  • Files created during dotnet publish fail when deployed to app service in azure #33105

Closed

  • `dotnet tool install`s unlisted and depreciated version #32728

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor WASM] Don't apply hot reload deltas if Blazor has not been initialized #33122
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix duplicate error code #33102
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • add GarbageCollectionAdaptationMode msbuild property #33043
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Don't run helix tests if the build fails #33045
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dependencies needed for source-build PVP flow #33039
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable some F# tests #16020
    Area-FSharp
  • Add warning about version/distro-specific RID assets in .NET 8+ #32970
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Standardize error messages #33084
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Validate existing suppressions and remove unnecessary suppressions when re-generating suppression files #32964
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add support for starting the application through CMD (instead of ENTRYPOINT). #33037
    untriaged
  • Containers: add support for using 'podman' without a system 'docker' alias. #32783
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Issue with static abstract in interfaces #7264

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009

PullRequests

Created

  • Publish notes for extensions WG 2023-06-07 #7263

Updated

  • Add details to lookup rules for for extensions #7179

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0060 (remove unused parameter) reported for primary constructor parameters. #68501
  • Code Metrics Tool should exclude generated code #68499
  • 参数结构构造函数 does not mean parameterless struct constructor #68491
  • Source Generator files with directories are not displayed correctly in IDE #68489
  • Issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68484

Closed

  • HotReload crashes with "An item with the same key has already been added" #68335
  • GetTypeByMetadataName would benefit greatly from non-alloc optimizations. #68343
    17.7
  • Code Analysis - List Unused Variables, Procedures & Functions #68498
  • Can we have an easy way of writing namespaces instead of changing it every time #68487
  • CodeFixProvider throws InvalidOperationException: 'ISymbolDeclarationService' is required to accomplish the task but is not available from the workspace #68440
    Next
  • Chain of code generators #68483
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Update EA layer for ASP.NET #68503
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extract a common helper for adding/getting private implementation class methods. #68502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Adds workarounds for Project System bugs in VS Code and a missing des… #68500
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle folders in source-generated file paths #68494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix ordering issue in analyzer callbacks for nested actions in symbol start analyzers #68490
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • [17.6] Ignore source generator diagnostics outside compilation #68488
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support for 'primary header spans' in sticky-scroll. #68450
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update version of roslyn-analyzers that Roslyn itself uses #68497
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [EnC] Upgrade change types for containing types #68368
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Allocate less in GetTypeByMetadataName #68415
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge internal fork of LSP tools back into Roslyn #68461
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into InlineArrays #68496
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge main to features/CollectionLiterals #68482
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to Nerdbank.Streams 2.9.116 #68492
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Support 'foreach' for inline arrays. #68297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Fix 'use primary constructor' with nested types. #68390
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use DelayTimeSpan where applicable #68338
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix 'Use Local Function' fixer in code style layer #68457
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge `main` into `features/RefReadonly` #68486
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Implement definite assignment and region analysis for inline array types #68339
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Allow parsing `ref readonly` modifier #68164
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0

Updated

  • workspace.TryApplyChanges should respect changes to DefaultNamespace, and other project information #46021
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update our 'delay until visible' logic to not throw cancellation exceptions #68382
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to primary constructors in IDE layer #68299
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refine parsing of potentially ambiguous casts/index expressions with collection literals #68456
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement extension member lookup (non-generic) #68342
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Don't rebind object initializer parents #68449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Skip checks for overridden or hidden members in overload resolution with extension methods #68316
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix HasFileLocalTypes check for constructed types #68386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, untriaged
  • Fix inserting new values with source generators #68451
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on remaining analysis contexts #68052
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Benchmarks] ApiCrudAdd/DeleteUpdate benchmarks broken #48680
  • IHtmlContent WriteTo is invoked after dispose of parent component scope #48681
  • QuicConnectionListenerTests.AcceptAsync_NoCertificateCallback_RemovedFromPendingConnections failing with leaked QuicConnection #48678
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #48677
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, plaintext #48676
  • SignalR KeepAlive Interval not being honored - Blazor Server #48675
  • Blazor dotnet.wasm compression/decompression doesn't round-trip #48674
  • Cannot inherit ComplexObjectModelBinder #48673
  • Razor syntax needs preprocessor directives #48672
  • Sometimes service marked with [FromServices] attribute isn't injected into controller's action #48671
  • Routing, exception and hosting metrics #48670
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #48668
  • Handle dotnet/extensions scenarios in ASP.NET http logging middleware #48667
    .NET 8.0
  • Handle dotnet/extensions scenarios in ASP.NET metrics middleware #48666
  • Website times out...startup.config is never called #48665

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #48608
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextSansFilter #48537
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #48525
  • Perf improvement: https, mapaction, mvc #48476
  • Perf improvement: json, json, plainTextWithFilter #48475
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #48474
  • Perf improvement: mvc, mvc, plaintext #48473
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, https, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #48472
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct, ApiCrudListProducts #48495
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails, ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #48494
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, plainTextEmptyFilter #48493
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mvc, plainTextSansFilter #48492
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, mapaction, plaintext #48491
  • Perf improvement: https, mvc, plainTextWithFilter #48490
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, plainTextSansFilter #48489

  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext, plaintext #48487
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, json #48486
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mvc, plaintext #48485
  • Perf improvement: https, https, https #48484
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json, plainTextWithFilter #48483
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #48482
  • Perf improvement: caching, endpoint, fortunes_ef #48481
  • Perf improvement: caching, mapaction, mvc #48480
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plaintext, plainTextWithFilter #48479
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #48478
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #48477
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, plainTextWithFilter #48340
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, multiple_queries, multiple_queries #48315
  • Perf improvement: https, json #48314
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, https #48301
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, https, updates #48300
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #48187
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #48109
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #48094
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #47987
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, plaintext #47986
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextWithFilter #47985
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, plaintext #47984
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plainTextSansFilter, updates #47965
  • Perf improvement: caching, caching #47911
  • Perf improvement: caching #47898
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, plaintext #47701
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #47445
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #47444
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper #47431
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes #47426
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #47376
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #47307
  • Perf regression: endpoint, multiple_queries, updates #47264
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, updates #47236

entry.content:

    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] [MAUI] New Recipe page layout is abnormal in Simulator/Emulator(API -33) landscape mode #15521
  • Blazor hybrid: No content in Webbrowser after some time in background #15520
  • [MAUI] Card will be truncated after resizing the window to be smaller and larger on Windows and MacCatalyst target #15519

Closed

  • The Blazor MAUI app crashes on Windows when an InputFile is used #15224
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Placing a slider in a grid column with a Width="*" and non-zero Margin causes a LayoutCycleException #10980
    Backlog
  • When the flow direction is changed in ScrollView as RTL, the scrolling direction remains unchanged in iOS and macOS #11026
    Backlog
  • Shell.TabBarIsVisible="False" is ignored #11151
    Backlog
  • White screen #15347
  • Deployment error when debugging on iOS Local Device: "Could not find a part of the path..." #15480
  • How to mix RTL and LTR characters in the same string when using collection view source. #15516
  • When using a barcode scanner, the Entry.Completed event is fired with empty Text #10663
    .NET 8 Planning
  • adding net7.0 tfm to project with handlers crashes #15314

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Workaround WinUI bug with adding/removing flyouts #14985
    area/controls 🎮, control-flyout
  • Remove netstandard2.1 #15355

  • Default ANDROID_SDK_ROOT if not set #15169
